title: Mad Jackal: The Rise of Jackal Junior
description: Short film. Hannah Byrnes, the main star of the in-universe TV show Riley 103, is deceased at the start of the story; her death is the catalyst for the events. Jackal Junior is the central figure with a Darth Vader–like voice. Serious subject matter; performers under 18 require parent/guardian permission and must have a parent or guardian present on set.
submissionDetails: Send your auditions and headshot to willez1997@gmail.com. Filming schedule subject to change. Meals provided; free copy of short film. Unpaid.

roles.description: 17–24. The main star of the in-universe TV show Riley 103; deceased at the start but her death is the catalyst for the story. Must be able to work with serious subject matter.
15–24. The Darth Vader–like voice for Jackal Junior. Must be able to record and email lines if chosen.
